name: Brooklyn Simmons
quote: Technology opens up a world of possibilities for interactive and engaging learning experiences and digital resources provide children with fun ways to explore and learn.

name: James leo
quote: Technology plays a significant part of our lives-and it will only become more prevalent as time goes on. The right amount of tech can positively affect a child's develoment, providing children with wealth of information and opportunities that were not available in times past.

name: Adria
quote: In today's increasingly digital world, children need to learn how to use tech, by understanding this, children will be better prepared for the future.

name: Michael
quote: Children can use technology to express their creative side. This self expression can help children develop a stronger sense of identity and can also help boost their confidence and self-esteem.

name: Dr. Patel
quote: With technology, children can learn how to solve problems in new and innovative ways, teching them to think outside the box-animportant skill in today's ever-changing world.

name: Dr. Patel
quote: It is essential that children acquire the knowledge, skills and attitudes needed to keep them safe and empowered in an increasingly digital world.

name: Dr. Patel
quote: With technology, children can easily communicate with others, stay in touch with friends and family living far away and in doing so help children develop critical social skills
